description: For infused medications, the length of time the infusion process, as a duration.  Note the difference between infuseOver and duration of treatment (specified in administrationFrequency). An order may call for infusing a patient TID for an hour each time over a duration of 5 days.

element.definition: For infused medications, the length of time the infusion process, as a duration.  Note the difference between infuseOver and duration of treatment (specified in administrationFrequency). An order may call for infusing a patient TID for an hour each time over a duration of 5 days.

name: The length of the infusion

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.definition: Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).

title: infuseOver
